title: The 10 richest royal families in Europe, ranked
text:
Queen Elizabeth II's $500 million-plus fortune is nothing compared to the net worth of some of Europe's other royal families.

While she is arguably the continent's most well-known royal, she isn't its wealthiest.

Read more: Meet the 10 richest billionaire royals in the world right now

That title falls to the royal families who have reported net worths well into the billions, such as Prince Albert II of Monaco.

Below, see how rich the 10 richest royals in Europe are, ranked by increasing net worth. Note that net worth is difficult to estimate for some royal families and may include allowances provided by the state in addition to personal fortune.
description: Queen Elizabeth II has a net worth over $500 million, but the British royal family isn't Europe's richest.
